![](media/404_not_found.gif){fig-alt="404 Not Found"}

Whoops!  The page you are looking for cannot be found.  This is likely for one of two reasons:

1.  We moved the page when we reorganized the website.
2.  It corresponds to a unit which _exists_ but isn't currently on the website.

Try searching for the page using the search bar at the top.  If you're sure this is a mistake, [contact us!](mailto:comet.project@ubc.ca)
